name: Surprise Graydle Attack!
text: When your opponent activates a card or effect: Special Summon 1 "Graydle" monster from your Hand, Deck, or GY, and if you do, that effect becomes "Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls". You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Graydle" card from your deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Surprise Graydle Attack!" once per turn.
